bibl.title: Ptolemaic Royal Sculpture from Egypt. The Interaction between Greek and Egyptian Traditions. (BAR International Series. 923.)
bibl.note: Diss. King's College London, 1999. - Introduction and Previous Scholarship. - 1. The Greek Tradition. - 2. Egyptian-style Representations of the Pharaoh. - 3. The Adoption of Greek Features on Egyptian-style Images of the Pharaoh. - 4. Ptolemaic Royal Women and the Egyptian Tradition. - 5. Representations of Isis, Egypt and the Ptolemaic Queens. - Appendices. Abbreviations. Bibliography. Catalogue [Nos 1-70]. Tables.
ASHTON Sally-Ann, Ptolemaic Royal Sculpture from Egypt. The Interaction between Greek and Egyptian Traditions. (BAR International Series. 923.)
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2001, 4°, ii-121 pp., tabl., figg., 19 pll. ISBN 1-84171-221-3. £25.
